'''Domains of Mastery''' are  [[Domain]]s that award [[Character Talent Material]]s. These are used to level up [[character]] [[talent]]s. They require {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=20}} to claim.

Players must reach [[Adventure Rank]] 27 or complete {{Quest|Of the Land Amidst Monoliths}} to unlock the entrances to Domains of Mastery, although the Domains within may have higher Adventure Rank entry requirements.
